metadata.subject: Henry IV, King of France, 1553-1610
metadata.title: P. Sixti V. Fvlmen brvtvm In Henricvm sereniss. Regem Nauarræ, & illustriss. Henricvm Borbonium, Principem olim Condæum, euibratum. Cuius multiplex nullitas ex protestatione patet. Cui, præter alia, subiuncta est Disputatio Roberti Bellarminii Soc. Ies. de Primatu Episcopi Rom. & ad eam Responsio. Item Alciati, Cviacii, & Hotomani Coniecturæ de falsitate l. inter claras 8. C. de Summ. Trinit. Cum Synopsi & Indice necessario ...
metadata.creator: Hotman, François,1524-1590.
Hotman, François, 1524-1590
Bellarmino, Roberto Francesco Romolo, Saint, 1542-1621
Catholic Church. Pope (1585-1590 : Sixtus V). Declaratio contra Henricum Borbonium
metadata.physical_description: 7 p. l., 231 p., 5 l.fold. tab.17 cm.
metadata.description: Some other editions under the title: Brutum fulmen Papae Sixti V. adversus Henricum sereniss. Regem Navarrae ..
Signatures: A-Q⁸; the blank Q8 missing in this copy

The bull of Sixtus V (p. 187-198) has a special t.p.: Sanctiss. D.N. Sixti Papae V. Declaratio, contra Henricvm Borbonivm assertvm Regem Navarrae, & Henricvm item Borbonivm, prætensum Principem Condensem Hæreticos, eorumq́ue ... Romæ, Apud Hæredes Antonii Bladii ... M.D. XXCV
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title and cover pages combined.
